K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:270b-1: a'arya bi ma la k'irti ni rde sha n'a ma ma h'a y'a na s'u tra /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:270b-3: 'phags pa dri ma med par grags pas bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:270b-9: ma byon pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:270b-10: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:270b-11: bcom ldan 'das yangs pa'i grong khyer na aa mra srung ba'i tshal na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:270b-12: dge slong brgyad stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:270b-13: thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:270b-16: dbang dang ldan par gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:270b-17: sems shin tu rnam par grol ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:270b-18: shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:270b-24: bdag gi don rjes su thob pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:270b-25: srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:270b-26: yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:270b-27: sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:270b-28: byang chub sems dpa' sum khri nyis stong dang yang thabs gcig ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:271a-0: mngon par shes pa mngon par shes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par @271a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:271a-1: shes pa chen po yongs su sbyangs pa las nges par byung ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:271a-2: sangs rgyas kyis byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:271a-3: chos kyi grong khyer srung ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:271a-4: dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:271a-5: seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:271a-6: phyogs bcur sgra shin tu bsgrags pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:271a-7: gsol ba ma btab par sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du gyur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:271a-8: dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs rgyun mi 'chad par byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:271a-11: pha rol gyi rgol ba thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:271a-17: spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:271a-19: kun nas ldang ba thams cad dang bral ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:271a-20: sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa la gnas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:271a-25: yang dag par sdom pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:271a-34: ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nges par byung ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:271a-35: mi dmigs pa'i chos la bzod pa dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:271a-36: phyir mi ldog pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:271a-37: mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir rgyas btab pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:271b-0: sems can thams cad kyi dbang po shes pa la mkhas @271b pa; 'khor thams cad zil gyis mi non pa'i mi 'jigs pas rnam par gnon pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:271b-2: ye shes kyi tshogs chen po bsags pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:271b-4: dpe byad bzang po thams cad kyis lus shin tu brgyan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:271b-7: ri rab kyi rtse mo mtho ba bzhin du snyan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:271b-9: lhag pa'i bsam pa rdo rje ltar sra bas sangs rgyas dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:271b-11: dge 'dun la mi phyed pa'i dad pa rnyed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:271b-12: chos rin po che'i 'od zer las bdud rtsi'i char shin tu 'bebs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:271b-13: sems can thams cad kyi skad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:271b-16: sgra rnam par dag pa'i dbyangs dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:271b-17: chos zab mo rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug cing mtha' dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:271b-18: mtha' med par lta ba'i bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba kun gcod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:271b-19: seng ge ltar 'jigs pa med cing sgra mngon par sgrogs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:271b-20: chos chen po'i 'brug sgra sgrogs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:271b-22: mi mtshungs pa'i chos las yang dag par 'das pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:271b-23: chos rin po che'i shes rab dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:271b-24: bsod nams kyi tshogs yang dag par sgrub pa'i ded dpon chen po /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:271b-30: rtogs par dka' ba'i chos kyi tshul la mkhas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:271b-31: sems can rnams kyi 'ong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:272a-0: sems can gyi bsam pa rtogs pa'i rjes su zhugs @272a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:272a-1: pa'i ye shes kyi yul dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:272a-3: mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:272a-6: sangs rgyas kyi ma 'dres pa la lhag pa'i bsam pas zhugs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:272a-8: ngan 'gro log par ltung ba'i 'jigs pa'i 'obs thams cad las brgal bas bsams bzhin du srid pa'i 'gro bar skye ba ston pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:272a-9: sman pa'i rgyal po chen po /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:272a-10: sems can thams cad 'dul ba'i cho ga la mkhas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:272a-11: sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i nad thams cad rtogs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:272a-12: ci rigs par chos kyi sman sbyar ba rab tu sbyor ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:272a-13: yon tan mtha' yas pa'i 'byung gnas dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:272a-14: sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas par yon tan bkod pas legs par brgyan pa mthong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:272a-16: gom pa 'dor ba 'bras bu yod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:272a-17: bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med par yon tan yongs su brjod kyang yon tan gyi chu bo mtha' yas bar rtogs pa la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:272a-19: byang chub sems dpa' mnyam par lta ba zhes bya dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:272a-20: mnyam mi mnyam lta ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:272a-21: ting nge 'dzin rnam par sprul pa'i rgyal po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:272a-26: rin po che bkod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:272b-2: rin po che brtsegs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:272b-3: lag na rin po che dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:272b-4: lag na phyag rgya rin po che dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:272b-8: rtag tu dga' dgod dbang po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:272b-9: mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:272b-11: smon lam la zhugs pas phyin pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:272b-12: so so yang dag par rig pa rab tu sgrub pa thob dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:272b-17: rin chen dpal dang mig 'phrul can dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:272b-19: dmigs pa med pa'i bsam gtan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:272b-24: rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:272b-26: seng ge'i nga ro mngon par bsgrags pa'i dbyangs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:272b-27: ri'i rtsa mo kun tu 'joms pa'i rgyal po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:272b-28: spos kyi glang po che dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:272b-29: spos kyi bla glang glang po che dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:272b-34: pad mo'i dpal gyi snying po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:272b-36: spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:272b-38: tshangs pa'i dra ba can dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:272b-39: rin chen gdan dkar can dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:273a-2: nor bu rin chen gdugs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:273a-6: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:273a-7: de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sum khri nyi sa stong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:273a-8: gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan med pa nas tshangs pa ral pa can la sogs pa tshangs pa khri bcom ldan 'das la lta ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:273a-11: chos mnyan pa'i phyir lhags pa de dag kyang 'khor de nyid du 'dus so; ;gling chen po bzhi pa so so nas kyang brgya byin khri nyis stong lhags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:273a-12: de dag kyang 'khor de nyid du 'dus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:273a-15: dbang che ba dbang che bar grags pa'i tshangs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:273a-25: lto 'phye chen po rnams kyang 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:273a-26: de bzhin du 'khor bzhi po dge slong dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:273a-29: dge bsnyen ma rnams kyang der lhags so; ;de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal gyi snying po'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:273a-30: 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:273b-0: rgya mtsho'i @273b nang nas ri'i rgyal po ri rab mngon par 'phags pa bzhin du 'khor thams cad zil gyis mnan te lha ma me lhan ne lhang re re dpal gyi snying po'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:273b-1: de nas byang chub sems dpa' li tsa b'i gzhon nu dkon mchog 'byung gnas li tsa b'i gzhon nu lnga brgya tsam dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:273b-2: rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs thogs nas yangs pa'i grong khyer chen po nas byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:273b-3: aa mra srung ba'i tshal ga la ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:273b-4: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:273b-5: bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun bskor ba byas nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:273b-6: rin po che'i gdugs ji lta bu thogs pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bskyabs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:273b-7: mngon par bskyabs nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:273b-8: rin po che'i gdugs de dag phul ma thag tu de'i mdo la sangs rgyas kyi mthus rin po che'i gdugs de dag gcig tu gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:273b-9: rin po che'i gdugs des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad khebs par snang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:273b-10: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi chu zheng de dag kyang rin po che'i gdugs chen po de nyid kyi nang na snang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:273b-11: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na ri'i rgyal po ri rab gang dag yod pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:274a-7: de dag thams cad kyang rin po che'i gdugs chen po de nyid kyi nang na snang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:274a-8: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na rgya mtsho chen po gang dag yod pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:274a-14: lu ma 'bab pa de dag thams cad kyang rin po che'i gdugs chen po de nyid kyi nang na snang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:274a-15: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na nyid ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:274a-16: zla ba'i gzhal med khang dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:274a-25: lto 'phye chen po'i gnas rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:274a-26: rgyal po chen po bzhi'i gnas dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:274a-31: rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang rin po che'i gdugs chen po gcig po de nyid kyi nang na snang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:274a-32: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos ston pa gang 'byung ba de'ang rin po che'i gdugs chen po gcig po de las 'byung ba'i sgrar grag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:274b-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das las de lta bu'i cho 'phrul chen po 'di @274b mthong nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar du gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:274b-1: tshim zhing mgu nas yi rangs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:274b-2: rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:274b-3: yid bde ba skyes nas de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag btsal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:274b-4: mig mi 'dzum par lta zhing 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:274b-5: de nas li tsa b'i gzhon nu dkon mchog 'byung gnas kyis bcom ldan 'das las de lta bu'i cho 'phrul chen po 'di mthong nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:274b-6: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:274b-7: gtsang zhing mdzes pa padma'i 'dab ltar yangs pa'i spyan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:274b-8: dgongs pa dag cing zhi gnas pha rol phyin mchog brnyes //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:274b-9: dge ba'i las bsags yon tan rgya mtsho dpag mi lang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:274b-10: dge sbyong zhi ba'i lam brten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:274b-11: skyes bu khyu mchog 'dren pa'i rdzu 'phrul khyod gzigs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:274b-12: bde bar gshegs pa'i zhing mchog rab gsal kun kyang gda'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:274b-13: khyod kyi chos kyi bka' mchid rgya che 'chi med 'gro /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:274b-14: de dag thams cad nam mkha' 'di yi dkyil na gda'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:274b-15: khyod kyi chos kyi rgyal srid mchog 'di chos kyi rgyal //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:274b-16: rgyal bas 'gro ba rnams la chos kyi nor kyang stsal //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:274b-17: chos rnams rab tu 'byed mkhas don dam ston mdzad pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:274b-18: chos kyi dbang phyug chos rgyal khyod la mgos phyag 'tshal //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:275a-1: ma lags pa dang ma mchis ma lags dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:275a-2: chos 'di thams cad rgyu las brten nas 'byung ba dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:275a-3: 'di la bdag med tshor ba pho dang byed med cing dge sdig las ci'ang chud mi za zhes gsung gis ston //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:275a-4: thub dbang khyod kyis bdud dpung stobs can rab btul nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:275a-5: byang chub mchog rab zhi ba mi 'chi bde ba brnyes //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:275a-6: de la tshor med sems dang yid kyi rgyu ba med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:275a-7: mu stegs ngan pa'i tshogs rnams kun gyis de mi rtogs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:275a-8: rmad byung chos kyi rgyal po lha mi mngon sum du //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:275a-9: lan gsum bzlas pa chos kyi 'khor lo rnam mang po //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:275a-10: shin tu zhi ba rang bzhin rnam dag rab tu bskor //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:275a-11: de tshe dkon mchog gsum po dag kyang nye bar bstan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:275a-12: khyod kyis dkon mchog chos kyis legs par gang btul ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:275a-13: de dag rtog pa ma mchis rtag par rab tu zhi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:275a-14: khyod ni skye rga na 'chi mthar 'byin sman pa'i mchog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:275a-15: yon tan rgya mtsho dpag mi lang la mgos phyag 'tshal //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:275a-16: ba sti stang legs par bgyis pas mi bskyod ri rab bzhin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:275a-17: tshul khrims ldan dang tshul khrims 'chal la mtshungs par byams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:275a-18: mnyam pa nyid la bzhugs shing thugs kyang nam mkha' bzhin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:275a-19: sems can dkon mchog 'di la su zhig mchod mi bgyid //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:275a-20: thub pa chen po 'khor rnams 'dus pa 'di dag ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:275a-21: khyod kyi zhal du rab tu dad pa'i yid kyis lta //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:275b-0: @275b thams cad kyis kyang rgyal ba rang gi mdun gnas mthong //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:275b-1: de ni rgyal ba'i ma 'dre sa sangs rgyas mtshan lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:275b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung gcig rab tu phyung ba yang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:275b-3: 'khor rnams kyis ni gsung la tha dad rnam par rig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:275b-4: 'gro ba dag gis rang gi don bzhin rnam rig pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:275b-5: de ni rgyal ba'i ma 'dres sangs rgyas mtshan lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:275b-6: gsung gcig rab tu bsgrags pa mdzad pa de yis ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:275b-7: kha cig bag chags bsgos shing kha cig rtogs par byas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:275b-8: som nyi 'tshal ba 'dren pas rab tu zhi mdzad de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:275b-9: de ni rgyal ba'i ma 'dres sangs rgyas mtshan legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:275b-10: stobs bcu 'dren pa'i rtsal mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:275b-11: 'jigs pa mi mnga' 'jigs bral khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:275b-12: ma 'dres pa yi chos rnams nges par rab rtogs pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:275b-13: 'gro ba thams cad 'dren pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:275b-14: kun tu sbyar ba'i bcings pa gcod la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:275b-15: pha rol phyin nas skam la bzhugs la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:275b-16: dub pa'i 'gro ba sgrol ba khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:275b-17: 'khor ba'i 'gro bar mi gnas pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:275b-18: sems can rnams dang 'gro bar bzhugs shing kun 'grogs kyang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:275b-19: 'gro ba thams cad las ni rnam par grol ba'i thugs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:275b-20: padma dag ni chu skyes chu yis yongs mi gos //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:275b-21: thub pa'i padmas stong pa nyid ni nges par bsgoms //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:276a-0: mtshan ma thams cad rnam pa kun @276a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:276a-2: khyod ni ci la'ang smon par mdzad pa yong mi mnga'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:276a-3: sangs rgyas dag gi mthu chen bsam gyis mi khyab ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:276a-4: nam mkha' lta bur mi gnas pa la bdag phyag 'tshal //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:276a-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das la li tsa ba'i gzhon nu dkon mchog 'byung gnas kyis tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:276a-7: li tsa b'i gzhon nu lnga brgya tsam po 'di dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:276a-8: 'di dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa gang lags zhes sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa zhu na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:276a-9: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa' de dag la sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa legs par bshad du gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:276a-10: de skad ces gsol ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:276a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis li tsa b'i gzhon nu dkon mchog 'byung gnas la legs so zhes bya ba byin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:276a-15: gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa las brtsams te de bzhin gshegs pa la 'dri ba legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:276a-16: de'i phyir gzhon nu khyod legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:276b-0: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs @276b rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa las brtsams te ngas khyod la bshad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:276b-2: legs so zhes gsol nas li tsa b'i gzhon nu dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:276b-3: li tsa b'i gzhon nu lnga brgya tsam po de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:276b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:276b-6: sems can gyi zhing ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:276b-8: byang chub sems dpa' ji tsam du sems can rnams la rgyas par byed pa de tsam du sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:276b-9: sems can rnams ji lta bus 'dul bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:276b-10: sangs rgyas kyi zhing la 'jug pa ji lta bus sems can rnams sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la 'jug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:276b-11: sangs rgyas kyi zhing la 'jug pa ji lta bus sems can rnams 'phags pa lta bu'i dbang po skye bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:276b-14: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni sems can gyi don las byung ba'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:276b-18: nam mkha' la ji lta bur bya ba 'dod pa de bzhin du byed mod kyi nam mkha' la ni byar mi rung zhing brgyan du'ang mi rung ba de bzhin du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:277a-2: chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mtshungs par shes nas byang chub sems dpa' sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji lta bur bya bar 'dod pa de lta bur sangs rgyas kyi zhing byed mod kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:277a-3: sangs rgyas kyi zhing nam mkhar ni byar mi rung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:277a-6: 'on kyang bsam pa'i zhing ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:277a-7: de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du sems can g-yo med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:277a-8: sgyu med pa rnams skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:277a-10: lhag pa'i bsam pa'i zhing ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:277a-11: de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:277a-12: tshogs thams cad bsags pa'i sems can rnams skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:277a-13: sbyor ba'i zhing ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:277a-14: de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du dge ba'i chos thams cad la gnas pa'i sems can rnams skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:277a-15: byang chub sems dpa'i sems bskyed pa rgya chen po byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:277a-16: de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:277b-0: sbyin pa'i zhing ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi @277b zhing ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:277b-1: de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i sems can rnams skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:277b-2: tshul khrims kyi zhing ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:277b-3: de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bsam pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su srung ba'i sems can rnams skye bar 'gyur ro; ;bzod pa'i zhing ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:277b-4: de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan cing bzod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:277b-6: zhi gnad dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i sems can rnams skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:277b-7: brtson 'grus kyi zhing ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:277b-8: de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der dge ba'i chos thams cad la brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i sems can rnams skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:277b-9: bsam gtan gyi zhing ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:277b-10: de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der dran pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:277b-11: shes bzhin gyi mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems can rnams skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:277b-12: shes rab kyi zhing ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:277b-13: de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der yang dag pa nyid du nges pa'i sems can rnams skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:278a-0: tshad med pa bzhi rnams ni byang chub sems @278a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:278a-1: dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:278a-2: de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der byams pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:278a-5: btang snyoms la gnas pa'i sems can rnams skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:278a-6: bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi rnams ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:278a-7: de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der rnam par grol ba thams cad kyis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:278a-8: thabs mkhas pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:278a-9: de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der thabs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:278a-10: spyod pa thams cad la mkhas pa'i sems can rnams skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:278a-11: byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun gyi chos rnams ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:278a-12: de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:278a-13: yang dag par spong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:278a-17: byang chub kyi yan lag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:278a-18: lam sgrub pa shes pa'i sems can rnams skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:278a-19: yongs su bsngo ba'i sems ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:278a-20: de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du yon tan thams cad kyi rgyan rnams snang bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:278b-0: mi khom pa brgyad rab tu zhi bar bstan pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi @278b zhing ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:278b-1: de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du ngan song thams cad shin tu chad cing mi khom pa brgyad med par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:278b-2: bdag nyid bslab pa'i gzhi rnams la gnas shing pha rol gyi ltung ba mi gleng ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:278b-3: de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der ltung ba'i sgra'ang mi grag par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:278b-4: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su dag pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:278b-5: de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der tshe nges pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:278b-8: bden pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'i tshig gis brgyan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:278b-11: bye ba sdum pa la mkhas pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:278b-12: phrag dog dang bral ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:278b-13: gnod sems kyi sems med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:278b-14: yang dag par lta ba dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:278b-16: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa ci 'dra bar bsam pa'ang de 'dra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:278b-17: bsam pa ci 'dra bar sbyor ba'ang de 'dra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:278b-18: sbyor ba ji snyed par lhag pa'i bsam pa'ang de snyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:278b-19: lhag pa'i bsam pa ji snyed par nges par sems pa'ang de snyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:278b-20: nges par sems pa ji snyed par sgrub pa'ang de snyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:278b-21: sgrub pa ji snyed par yongs su bsngo ba'ang de snyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:278b-22: yongs su bsngo ba ji snyed par thabs rnams kyang de snyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:279a-1: rnams ji snyed par zhing yongs su dag pa'ang de snyed de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:279a-2: zhing yongs su dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can yongs su dag pa'ang de bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:279a-3: sems can yongs su dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ye shes yongs su dag pa'ang de bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:279a-4: ye shes yongs su dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du bstan pa yongs su dag pa'ang de bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:279a-5: bstan pa yongs su dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ye shes bsgrubs pa yongs su dag pa'ang de bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:279a-6: ye shes bsgrubs pa yongs su dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rang gi sems yongs su dag pa'ang de bzhin te; rigs kyi bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:279a-7: de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed 'dod pas rang gi sems yongs su sbyang ba la nan tan bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:279a-9: ji lta bur byang chub sems dpa'i sems yongs su dag pa de 'dra bar sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:279a-10: de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:279a-11: gal te ji lta bur sems yongs su dag pa de 'dra bar byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:279a-12: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:279a-13: de sems yongs su ma dag gam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:279a-14: ci nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di lta bur yongs su ma dag par snang snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:279b-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das @279b kyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu'i sems kyi yongs su rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:279b-3: nyi ma dang zla ba yongs su ma dag gam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:279b-4: ci na dmus long dag gis mi mthong /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:279b-8: de ni dmus long gis nongs kyi nyi ma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:279b-9: zla bas ni ma nongs so; ;bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:279b-11: de bzhin du sems can la las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi rgyan bkod pa mi mthong ba de ni sems can rnams kyi mi shes pas nyes kyi de la de bzhin gshegs pas nyes pa ni ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:279b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni yongs su dag mod kyi khyod kyis de mi mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:279b-14: de nas tshangs pa ral pa can gyis gnas brtan sh'a ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:279b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su ma dag go zhes ma zer cig; btsun pa sh'a ri'i bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:279b-17: bcom ldan 'das kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:279b-20: gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi gnas kyi bkod pa bzhin du bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing bkod pa'ang kho bos de 'dra ba mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:280a-0: de nas gnas brtan sh'a ri'i bus tshangs pa ral pa can la 'di skad ces smras @280a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:280a-2: kho bos ni sa chen po 'di mtho dman dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:280a-7: 'jim ngan gyis rab tu gang bar mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:280a-8: tshangs pa ral pa can gyis smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:280a-9: 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di 'dra bar yongs su ma dag par mthong ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:280a-11: sems la mtho dman yod cing sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la bsam pa yongs su ma dag par nges so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:280a-14: sems can thams cad la sems mnyam zhing sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la bsam pa yongs su dag pa de dag gis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di yongs su dag pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:280a-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di la zhabs kyi mthe bos bsnun pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:280a-16: bsnun ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che du ma brtsegs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:280a-17: rin po che brgya stong du ma'i tshogs dag rin po che brgya stong du ma so sor bkod par gyur pa 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:280a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che bkod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rin chen mtha' yas bkod pa bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'ang de 'dra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:280a-20: de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de'ang ngo mtshar du gyur cing bdag nyid kyang rin po che'i padma bkod pa'i stan la 'dug pa snyam byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:280b-0: de nas @280b bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:280b-2: khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa 'di mthong ngam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:280b-6: sngon ma mthong ma thos pa'i bkod pa 'di dag gda'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:280b-9: sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di ni rtag tu 'di 'dra mod kyi sems can dman pa rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de lta bur nyes pa mang po'i skyon chags par ston te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:280b-13: lha'i bu rnams rin po che'i snod gcig tu zas za'ang bsod nams ji lta bu bsags pa'i bye brag gis lha'i zas bdud rtsi nye bar gnas pa de bzhin du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:280b-15: sems can sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu skyes pa dag kyang sems can ji ltar yongs su dag pa bzhin du sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:280b-16: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi rgyan bkod pa 'di snang ba na srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:280b-17: li tsa b'i gzhon nu gang dag li tsa b'i gzhon nu dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang lhan cig tu lhags pa lnga brgya bo de dag kyang rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa thob par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:280b-18: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul de dag brtul ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:281a-0: de nas yang sangs rgyas kyi @281a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:281a-1: zhing de phyir sngon gyi rang bzhin du gyur par snang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:281a-2: de na nyan thos kyi theg pa can gyi lha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:281a-3: mi rnams 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:281a-4: kye ma'o 'du byed 'di dag ni mi rtag go snyam du rig nas srog chags sum khri nyis stong chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral bar rnam par dag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:281a-5: dge slong brgyad stong ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:281a-6: sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya chen po la mos pa'i srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong yang chos thams cad rnam par bsgrubs pas nye bar bzhag pa'i mtshan nyid du rig nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:281a-7: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:281a-8: yang de'i tshe yangs pa'i grong khyer chen po na li tsa b'i dri ma med par grags pa zhes bya ba zhig 'dug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:281a-9: sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas shing dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:281a-10: sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:281a-13: mngon par shes pa chen pos rnam par rtsen pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:281a-18: chos kyi tshul zab mo la shin tu zhugs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:281a-19: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nges par byung ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:281a-20: thabs mkhas pa rtogs par khong du chud pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:281b-1: sems can gyi bsam pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:281b-3: sems can gyi dpang po mchog dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:281b-4: mchog ma yin pa shes pa las nges par byung ba so so ci rigs par chos ston pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:281b-5: theg pa chen po 'di la brtson par byas shing shes par byas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:281b-6: shin tu brtags te las byed pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:281b-7: sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam la gnas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:281b-8: blo dam pa rgya mtsho lta bu'i rjes su zhugs pa; sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod cing bkur te rab tu bsngags pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:281b-11: 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyis phyag byas pa de sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir thabs mkhas pas yangs pa'i grong khyer chen po na gnas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:281b-12: sems can mgon med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:281b-13: dbul po rnams bsdu ba'i phyir longs spyod zad mi shes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:281b-14: sems can tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams bsdu pa'i phyir tshul khrims yongs su dag pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:281b-19: khro ba'i sems can rnams bsdu ba'i phyir bzod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:281b-21: sems can le lo can rnams bsdu ba'i phyir brtson 'grus 'bar ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:281b-22: sems 'khrug pa'i sems can rnams bsdu ba'i phyir bsam gtan dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:281b-25: sems can 'chal pa'i shes rab can rnams bsdu ba'i phyir shes rab rnam par nges pa thob pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:282a-1: la dge sbyong gi spyod pas phun sum tshogs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:282a-2: khyim gyi gnas na gnas la 'dod pa'i khams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:282a-4: gzugs med pa'i khams dang ma 'dres pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:282a-7: slas rnams kyang rtag tu tshangs par spyod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:282a-8: g-yog bran gyis yongs su bskor bar snang yang rab tu dpen par spyod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:282a-9: rgyan gyis brgyan par snang yang rtag tu mtshan dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:282a-10: zas skom gyis zas za bar snang ba'ang rtag tu bsam gtan gyi dga' ba'i zas za ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:282a-12: rgyan po'i grva thams cad na snang yang rtsed mo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:282a-13: rgyan po la chags pa'i sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed cing rtag tu don yod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:282a-14: spyod pa ya mtshan can thams cad tshol yang sangs rgyas la mi phyed pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:282a-16: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gsang sngags dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:282a-17: bstan bcos kyi rnam par shes kyang rtag chos kyi kun dga' la dga' mos pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:282a-18: 'du 'dzi kun gyi nang na snang yang thams cad kyi nang na gtso bor mchod pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:282a-19: 'jig rten dang mthun par bya ba'i phyir rgan rabs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:282a-21: gzhon nu'i grogs su gyur cing chos bzhin du smra ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:282a-22: tha snyad thams cad du 'jug kyang rnyed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:282a-23: longs spyod la re ba med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:282a-24: sems can thams cad gdul ba'i phyir lam gyi bzhi mdo dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:282b-0: su ma mdo @282b thams cad na'ang snang la sems can rnams srung ba'i phyir rgyal po'i bya ba rnams la'ang zhugs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:282b-1: theg pa dman pa la mos pa zlog cing theg pa chen po la sems can rnams yang dag par gzud pa'i phyir chos nyan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:282b-2: yang dag par brjod pa thams cad na'ang snang ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:282b-3: byis pa rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir yi ge'i grva khang thams cad tu'ang 'gro ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:282b-4: 'dod pa'i nyes pa yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir smad 'tshong gi khyim kun tu'ang 'jug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:282b-5: dran pa yang dag par gzhag pa'i phyir chang 'tshong ba'i khyim thams cad du'ang 'jug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:282b-6: chos kyi mchog bstan pa'i phyir tshong dpon gyi nang du'ang tshong dpon du kun gyis bkur ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:282b-7: 'dzin pa thams cad kyi len pa yongs su gcad pa'i phyir khyim bdag gi nang du'ang khyim bdag tu kun gyis bkur ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:282b-10: stobs la rab tu dgod pa'i phyir rgyal rigs kyi nang du rgyal rigs su kun gyis bkur ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:282b-13: dregs pa shin tu gzhom pa'i phyir bram ze'i nang du'ang bram zer kun gyis bkur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:282b-14: rgyal po'i bya ba thams cad chos dang mthun par bsgo ba'i phyir blon po'i nang du'ang blon por kun gyis bkur ba; rgyal po'i longs spyod dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:282b-15: dbang phyug la chags pa bzlog pa'i phyir gzhon nu'i nang du'ang gzhon nur kun gyis bkur ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:283a-0: bud med gzhon nu yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir btsun @283a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:283a-1: mo'i 'khor gyi nang du'ang nyug rum du kun gyis bkur pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:283a-2: tha mal pa'i bsod nams khyad par du 'phags par dmigs par bya ba'i phyir skye bo phal po dang yang mthun par 'jug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:283a-3: dbang phyug gi bdag por bstan pa'i phyir brgya byin gyi nang du'ang brgya byin du kun gyis bkur ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:283a-4: ye shes kyi khyad par bstan pa'i phyir tshangs pa'i nang du'ang tshangs par kun gyis bkur ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:283a-5: sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir 'jig rten skyong bar kun gyis bkur ba ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:283a-6: de ltar li tsa b'i dri ma med par grags pa tshad med pa'i thabs la mkhas pa'i ye shes dang ldan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:283a-7: yangs pa'i grong khyer chen po na gnas shing 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:283a-8: de thabs la mkhas pas bdag nyid na blta bur bstan nas de la nad 'dri ba'i phyir yangs pa'i grong khyer chen po nas rgyal po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:283a-17: de ma yin pa srog chags stong phrag mang po nad 'drir 'ongs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:283a-18: der lhags pa de dag la li tsa b'i dri ma med par grags pas 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i lus 'di nyid las brtsams nas chos ston te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:283a-20: lus 'di ni 'di ltar mi rtag pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:283a-22: 'di ltar yid brtan du mi rung ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:283b-7: grogs po dag 'di ltar lus 'di ni nad mang po'i snod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:283b-8: mkhas pas de la gnas par mi bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:283b-10: lus 'di ni bcang mi bzod pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:283b-11: dbu ba rdos pa lta bu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:283b-12: lus 'di ni ring du mi gnas pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:283b-14: lus 'di ni nyon mongs pa'i sred pa las byung ba ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:283b-16: lus 'di ni snying po med pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:283b-17: chu shing gi sdong po lta bu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:283b-18: kye ma lus 'di ni rus pa la rgyas pas sprel ba ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:283b-20: lus 'di ni phyin ci log las byung ba ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:283b-22: lus 'di ni yang dag pa ma yin pa mthong ba ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:283b-24: lus 'di ni sngon gyi las kyis gzugs brnyan snang ba ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:283b-26: lus 'di ni rkyen la rag lus pa'i phyir /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:283b-28: lus 'di ni sems 'khrug cing 'gyes pa'i mtshan nyid de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:283b-30: lus 'di ni skad cig tu 'jig pa dang ldan zhing mi gnas pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:283b-32: lus 'di ni rkyen sna tshogs las byung ba ste bdag po med pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:284a-0: @284a *// lus 'di ni nam mkha' dang 'dra ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:284a-2: lus 'di ni 'byung ba chen po rnams kyi gnas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:284a-3: yang dag pa ma yin pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:284a-13: lus 'di ni rlung gi 'khrul 'khor dang ldan pas 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:284a-16: mi gtsang ba bsags pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:284a-18: lus 'di ni rtag tu bsku ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:284a-21: 'gyes pa'i chos can te; gsob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:284a-22: lus 'di ni nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi sa gtses pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:284a-23: lus 'di ni rtag tu rga bas zil gyis non pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:284a-24: khron pa rnying pa dang 'dra ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:284a-25: lus 'di ni 'chi ba'i mtha' yin te; mthar mi gnas pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:284a-28: skye mched kyis yongs su zin pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:284a-31: grong stong pa lta bu ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:284a-32: khyod kyis de lta bu'i lus de la yid byung ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:284a-33: skyo ba bskyed cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la mos pa bskyed par bgyi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:284a-35: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni chos kyi sku ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:284a-37: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni bsod nams las skyes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:284b-0: @284b rnam par grol ba las skyes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:284b-1: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba las skyes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:284b-8: yang dag par sdom pa las skyes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:284b-9: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam las skyes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:284b-12: brtson 'grus brtan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba las skyes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:284b-16: snyoms par 'jug pa las skyes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:284b-20: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun las skyes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:284b-24: mi 'jigs pa bzhi las skyes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:284b-25: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad las skyes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:284b-26: pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad las skyes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:284b-29: mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spangs pa las skyes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:284b-30: dge ba'i chos thams cad yang dag par sdud pa las skyes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:284b-32: yang dag pa nyid las skyes pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:284b-33: bag yod pa las skyes pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:284b-35: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni dge ba'i las tshad med pa las skyes pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:284b-36: khyed kyi de lta bu'i sku de la mos pa bskyed par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:285a-0: sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i nad rab tu spang ba'i phyir bla na med pa @285a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:285a-1: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:285a-2: de bzhin du li tsa b'i dri ma med par grags pas de ltar na 'dri ba'i tshogs pa de dag la ji nas sems can brgya stong mang po dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de lta de lta bur chos 'chad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:285a-3: thabs la mkhas pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i le'u zhes bya ste gnyis pa'o ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:285a-4: de nas li tsa b'i dri ma med par grags pa 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:285a-5: bdag ni na zhing mi bde ste khri'i steng na 'dug na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:285a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bdag la ma dgongs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:285a-7: thugs mi brtse ba'i phyir nad 'dri ba 'ga' yang ma btang ngo snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:285a-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis li tsa b'i dri ma med par grags pa'i sems kyi rtog pa de lta bu mkhyen nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:285a-10: khyod li tsa b'i dri ma med par grags pa'i nad 'drir song zhig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:285a-11: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:285a-12: bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol rto //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:285a-14: bdag li tsa b'i dri ma med par grags pa'i blo 'dri zhing 'chi bar mi spro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:285a-15: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:285a-17: bdag gis mngon par 'tshal ba dus gcig na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:285b-0: shing zhig @285b gi drung na nang du yang dag bzhag par gyur pa na li tsa b'i dri ma med par grags pa yang shing de'i drung ga la ba der mchis nas bdag la 'di skad ces mchi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:285b-1: btsun pa sh'a ri'i bu; ji ltar khyod kyis nang du yang dag par bzhag pa de lta bu'i nang du yang dag 'dzeg pa la nang du yang dag bzhag par mi bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:285b-2: ji ltar khams gsum du lus dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:285b-3: sems mi snang bar 'gyur ba de ltar nang du yang dag gzhag par gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:285b-4: ji ltar 'gog pa las kyang mi ldang zhing spyod lam kun tu'ang snang bar 'gyur pa de ltar nang du yang dag gzhag par gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:285b-5: ji ltar thob pa'i mtshan nyid kyang mi 'dor la so so'i skye bo'i mtshan nyid du'ang snang ba de ltar nang du yang dag gzhag par gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:285b-6: ji ltar khyod kyi sems nang na'ang mi 'dug la phyi rol gyi gzugs la'ang mi rgyu ba de ltar nang du yang dag gzhag par gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:285b-7: ji ltar lta bar gyur pa thams cad la'ang mi g-yo zhing byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun rnams la'ang snang ba de ltar nang du yang dag gzhag par gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:285b-8: ji ltar 'khor ba na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyang mi spong la; mya ngan las 'das pa la'ang yang dag par gzhol bar 'gyur ba de ltar nang du yang dag gzhag par gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:286a-0: gang dag de ltar nang du yang @286a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:286a-1: dag bzhag pa la nang du yang dag 'jog na de dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:286a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis nang du yang dag 'jog par bka' stsal to zhes mchi nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:286a-4: bdag gis chos nyid de thos nas de la slar tshig lan ldon pa'i rngo ma thogs shing cad mi mchi bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:286a-5: de'i slad du bdag skyes bu dam pa de'i bro 'dri zhing mchi bar mi spro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:286a-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa moonggal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:286a-8: khyod li tsa b'i dri ma med par grags pa'i nad 'drir song zhig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:286a-9: moonggal gyi bus kyang gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:286a-11: bdag skyes bu dam pa de'i phro 'dri zhing mchi bar mi spro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:286a-12: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:286a-14: bdag gis mngon par 'tshal ba dus gcig na yangs pa'i grong khyer chen po'i srang zhig gi sgo na khyim bdag rnams la bdag chos ston cing mchis pa'i drung der li tsa b'i dri ma med par grags pa mchis nas bdag la 'di skad ces mchi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:286a-16: ji ltar ston pa ltar ni khyim pa gos dkar po can rnams la de ltar chos mi bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:286a-18: chos de ji lta ba bzhin du chos bstan par bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:286a-20: chos ni sems can med pa ste sems can gyi rdul dang bral ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:286b-0: bdag med @286b ba ste 'dod chags kyi rdul dang bral ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:286b-1: srog med pa ste skye ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:286b-3: gang zag med pa ste sngon gyi mtha' dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:286b-4: phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su ma chad pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:286b-6: nye bar zhi ba'i mtshan nyid de 'dod chags dang bral ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:286b-7: dmigs pa med par 'gro ba ste yi ge med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:286b-10: rlabs thams cad dang bral ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:286b-11: thams cad kyi rjes su song ba ste nam mkha' dang mnyam zhing mtshungs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:286b-15: rgyu ba thams cad dang bral ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:286b-18: rnam par rig pa med pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:286b-21: rnam par shes pa dang bral pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:286b-22: gnyen po med pa'i phyir 'dra ba med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:286b-23: rgyu dang mi mthun zhing rkyen du sgro 'dogs pa med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:286b-24: chos kyi dbyings su yang dag par 'du ba'i phyir chos thams cad ni mnyam par bzhag pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:286b-25: rjes su mi 'gro ba'i tshul gyis de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su song ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:286b-26: shin tu ma g-yos pa'i phyir yang dag pa nyid kyi mtha' la gnas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:286b-27: yul drug la mi rten pas ma g-yos pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:286b-28: mi gnas pas gang du'ang 'gro ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:286b-30: stong pa nyid du yang dag par 'du ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:286b-31: mtshan ma med pas rab tu bye ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:286b-32: smon pa med pa'i mtshan nyid rtog ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:286b-34: dor ba med cing gzhag pa med pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:287a-1: yid kyi lam las yang dag par 'das pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:287a-6: rgyu ba thams cad dang bral ba ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:287a-7: btsun pa moonggal gyi bu chen po /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:287a-8: de lta bu'i chos la bstan pa ji lta bu zhig yod /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:287a-9: btsun pa moonggal gyi bu chen po /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:287a-10: chos bstan pa zhes bya ba de'ang sgro btags pa'i tshig ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:287a-11: gang dag nyan pa de dag kyang sgro btags pa nyan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:287a-13: gang la sgro btags pa'i tshig med pa de la chos ston pa'ang med de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:287a-17: sgyu ma'i skyes bus sgyu ma'i skyes bu dag la chos bstan pa bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:287a-18: de lta bur sems gnas pas chos bstan par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:287a-19: khyod kyis sems can gyi dbang po la mkhas par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:287a-20: shes rab kyi mig gis legs par mthong ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:287a-21: snying rje chen po mngon du gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:287a-22: theg pa chen po'i bsngags pa brjod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:287a-23: sangs rgyas la byas pa gzo ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:287a-25: chos kyi nges pa'i tshig rnam par shes pas dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs ma chad par bya ba'i phyir khyod kyis chos bstan par bya'o zhes mchi ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:287b-0: de lta de lta bur des chos bstan pas khyim bdag gi 'khor de las khyim bdag brgyad brgya bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i @287b byang chub tu sems skyes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:287b-1: bdag kyang spobs pa ma mchis par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:287b-3: de'i slad du bdag skyes bu dam pa de'i bro 'dri zhing mchi bar mi spro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:287b-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:287b-6: khyod li tsa b'i dri ma med par grags pa'i nad 'drir song zhig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:287b-7: 'od srung chen pos kyang gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:287b-9: bdag skyes bu dam pa de'i bro 'dri zhing mchi bar mi spro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:287b-10: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:287b-11: bdag gis mngon par 'tshal ba dus gcig na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:287b-12: dbul po'i srang du bsod snyoms la mchis na li tsa b'i dri ma med par grags pa der mchis nas bdag la 'di skad ces mchi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:287b-13: 'di ltar sems can chen po'i khyim bkol te dbul po'i khyim rnams su 'gro ba ni /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:287b-14: btsun pa 'od srung chen po'i byams pa phyogs gcig pa yin gyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:287b-16: chos mnyam pa nyid la gnas par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:287b-17: dus thams cad du sems can thams cad la bsams te bsod snyoms btsal bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:287b-18: zas med par zas btsal bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:287b-19: gzhan gyi ril por 'dzin pa bsal ba'i phyir khyod bsod snyoms la 'gro bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:287b-20: grong stong par byin gyis brlabs te khyod grong du 'jug par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:287b-22: bud med yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir khyod grong khyer du 'jug par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:287b-23: sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyis khyod khyim du 'gro bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:288a-0: @288a *// mi len pas bsod snyoms blang bar bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:288a-1: dmus long dang mtshungs par gzugs rnams la blta'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:288a-2: brag ca dang 'dra bar sgra rnams mnyan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:288a-3: rlung dang mtshungs par dri rnams mnam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:288a-4: rnam par rig pa med pas ro rnams myong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:288a-5: ye shes la reg pa med pas reg bya rnams la reg par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:288a-6: sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rnam par rig pas chos rnams la rig par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:288a-7: gang bdag gi dngos po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:288a-8: gzhan gyi dngos po de ni mi 'bar ba'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:288a-9: gang mi 'bar ba de ni zhi bar mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:288a-12: log pa nyid brgyad las kyang mi 'da' zhing rnam par thar pa brgyad la'ang snyoms par 'jug cing log pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyis yang dag pa'i mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:288a-13: bsod snyoms gcig kyang sems can thams cad la sbyin zhing sangs rgyas thams cad dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:288a-14: 'phags pa thams cad la'ang dbul te; phul nas gdod bdag gis bza' ba lta na ji ltar nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'ang ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:288a-15: nyon mongs dang bral ba'ang ma yin pa de ltar bza'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:288a-16: mnyam par bzhag pa'ang ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:288a-17: langs pa'ang ma yin par bza'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:288a-18: 'khor ba la'ang mi gnas la mya ngan las 'das pa'ang mi gnas par bza'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:288b-0: khyod la gang dag bsod snyoms @288b sbyin par byed pa de dag kyang 'bras bu che bar yang mi 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:288b-4: sangs rgyas gshegs par yang dag par gzhol bar bya yi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:288b-5: nyan thos 'gro bar yang dag par gzhol bar mi bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:288b-7: de ltar yul 'khor gyi bsod snyoms don yod par bza'o zhes mchi ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:288b-9: bdag chos bstan pa 'di thos nas ngo mtshar du gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:288b-10: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:288b-11: khyim na gnas pa'ang 'di lta bu'i spobs pa dang ldan na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:288b-12: su zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems mi skyed snyam nas de tshun chad bdag gis sems can gang yang theg pa chen po ma lags par nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:288b-13: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la sngon chad ma btsud do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:288b-15: de'i slad du bdag skyes bu dam pa de'i bro 'dri zhing mchi bar mi spro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:288b-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:288b-18: khyod li tsa b'i dri ma med par grags pa'i nad 'drir song zhig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:288b-21: bdag skyes bu dam pa de'i bro 'dri zhing mchi bar mi spro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:288b-22: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:289a-2: yangs pa'i grong khyer chen por li tsa b'i dri ma med par grags pa'i khyim du bsod snyoms la mchis pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:289a-3: li tsa b'i dri ma med par grags pas bdag gi lhung bzed 'tshal nas zas bzang pos bkang ste 'di skad ces mchi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:289a-5: khyod gal te zang zing gi mnyam pa nyid rjes su rtogs shing; chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi mnyam pa nyid rjes su rtogs na gzod bsod snyoms 'di longs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:289a-9: gti mug kyang ma spangs la de dag dang lhan cig tu'ang mi gnas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:289a-10: gal te 'jig tshogs la lta ba'ang mi bskyod la bgrod pa gcig pa'i lam du'ang song /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:289a-11: khyod kyis ma rig pa dang srid pa'i sred pa'ang ma bcom la rig pa dang rnam par grol pa'ang ma bskyed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:289a-12: mtshams med pa'i mnyam pa nyid dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:289a-13: khyod kyi rnam par grol ba'ang mtshungs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:289a-14: khyod grol ba'ang ma yin la bcings pa'ang ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:289a-15: khyod kyis 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'ang ma mthong la bden pa ma mthong ba'ang ma yin; 'bras bu thob pa'ang ma yin la so so'i skye bo'ang ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:289a-16: so so'i skye bo'i chos las kyang ma log /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:289a-17: khyod 'phags pa'ang ma yin la ma 'phags pa'ang ma yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:289b-0: @289b chos thams cad dang yang ldan la chos thams cad kyi 'du shes dang yang bral /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:289b-1: khyod kyis ston pa'ang ma mthong /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:289b-3: dge 'dun la'ang bsnyen bkur ma byas shing ston pa drug po gang yin pa de dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:289b-6: kun tu rgyu gnag lhas kyi bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:289b-7: smra 'dod kyi bu mo'i bu yang dag rgyal ba can dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:289b-8: k'a tya'i bu nog can dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:289b-9: mi pham skra'i la ba can dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:289b-10: gcer bu gnyen gyi bu de dag btsun pa'i ston pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:289b-11: de dag la brten nas khyod rab tu byung zhing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:289b-12: ston pa drug po de dag gir 'gro bar 'phags pa rab 'byor yang 'gro la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:289b-13: lta bar gyur pa thams cad kyi nang du'ang khyod chud cing mtha' dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:289b-15: khyod mi khom pa brgyad du'ang 'jug la dal ba thob pa'ang med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:289b-16: khyod kun nas nyon mongs pa dang mnyam par gyur la rnam par byang ba'ang khong du ma chud /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:289b-17: gang sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa med pa de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:289b-18: btsun pa'i nyon mongs pa med pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:289b-19: khyod kyi sbyin pa'ang rnam par ma sbyangs /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:289b-21: khyod la su dag bsod snyoms sbyin par byed pa de dag kyang log par ltung bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:289b-22: khyod bdud thams cad dang yang lhan cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:289b-23: nyon mongs pa thams cad kyang khyod kyi grogs su gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:289b-24: nyon mongs pa'i ngo bo nyid gang yin pa btsun pa'i ngo bo nyid kyang de yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:290a-1: la'ang khyod kyis gsang ba'i sems nye bar gzhag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:290a-2: sangs rgyas thams cad la'ang khyod kyis skur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:290a-3: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la'ang mi snyan par byas; dge 'dun la'ang khyod mi rton cing nam yang yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' na gdod khyod kyis bsod snyoms 'di longs shig ces mchi ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:290a-4: bstan pa 'di de las thos nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:290a-6: de la bdag gis ji skad bshad /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:290a-9: phyogs bcu mun par gyur nas bdag gis lhung bzed de'ang bor te khyim nas slar 'byung bar bgyis na li tsa b'i dri ma med par grags pa bdag la 'di skad ces mchi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:290a-11: yi ge dag la ma 'jigs par lhung bzed 'di longs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:290a-12: btsun pa rab 'byor; 'di ji snyam du sems /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:290a-13: gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa la de skad byas na de ji skrag par 'gyur ram /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:290a-16: de lta ma yin no zhes bgyis so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:290a-19: sgyu ma sprul pa'i rang bzhin gyi chos thams cad la skrag par ma byed cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:290a-21: tshig de dag thams cad kyang de'i rang bzhin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:290a-22: de ltar mkhas pa dag yi ge rnams la'ang mi chags shing de dag la skrag par mi byed pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:290b-0: yi ge de dag thams cad ni yi ge @290b med pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:290b-1: rnam par grol ba ni ma gtogs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:290b-2: chos thams cad ni rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:290b-3: bstan pa 'di bshad pa na lha'i bu nyis brgya chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:290b-4: lha'i bu lnga brgya ni rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa thob par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:290b-5: bdag kyang spobs pa ma mchis par gyur nas de la slar lan ldon pa'i rngo ma thog ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:290b-7: de'i slad du bdag skyes bu dam pa de'i bro 'dri zhing mchi bar mi spro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:290b-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:290b-10: khyod li tsa b'i dri ma med par grags pa'i nad 'dir song zhig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:290b-13: bdag skyes bu dam pa de'i bro 'dri zhing mchi bar mi spro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:290b-14: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:290b-16: bdag gis mngon par 'tshal ba dus gcig na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:290b-17: nags tshal chen po'i sa phyogs shig na las dang po pa'i dge slong dag la chos ston cing mchis na li tsa b'i dri ma med par grags pa der mchis nas bdag la 'di skad ces mchi'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:290b-19: snyoms par zhugs te dge slong 'di dag gi sems ltos la chos ston cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:290b-20: rin po che'i snod chen por zan rul ma blugs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:290b-21: dge slong 'di dag gi bsam pa ji lta bu shes par gyis la nor bu rin po che bee d'urya mching bu'i nor bu dang mtshungs par ma byed cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:291a-1: sems can gyi dbang po dag la ma brtags par nyi tshe ba'i dbang po nye bar ma sgrubs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:291a-2: rma med pa la rma ma phyungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:291a-3: lam chen por 'jug par 'dod pa srang dog par ma gzud cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:291a-4: rgya mtsho chen po ba lang gi rmig rjes su ma blugs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:291a-5: ri rab yungs 'bru'i nang du ma gzhug cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:291a-6: nyi ma'i 'od srin bu me khyer gyis ma bzlog cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:291a-7: seng ge'i sgra sgrogs par 'dod pa rnams wa'i sgra la ma gzud cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:291a-9: dge slong 'di dag thams cad ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa las byang chub kyi sems stor ba sha stag ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:291a-11: 'di dag la nyan thos kyi theg pa ma ston cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:291a-12: nyan thos kyi theg pa ni yang dag pa ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:291a-13: sems can gyi dbang po'i rim pa shes pa la nyan thos 'di dag ni kho bos dmus long dang 'dra ba snyam byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:291a-14: de nas li tsa b'i dri ma med par grags pa de'i tshe ji ltar dge slong de dag sngon gyi gnas rnam pa mang po rjes su dran par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:291a-15: de dag la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir sangs rgyas lnga brgya la bsnyen bkur byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:291a-16: de dag gi byang chub kyi sems de'ang mngon du gyur nas de dag skyes bu dam pa de'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag btsal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:291b-0: @291b thal mo sbyar bar gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-060-005:291b-1: des kyang de dag la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan nas /
